title: Senior Python Developer
description: We are looking for an experienced Python developer with expertise in FastAPI, Django, and machine learning. The ideal candidate should have strong skills in building scalable APIs and working with cloud technologies.
requirements: Experience with Docker and cloud platforms

title: Frontend Developer - React
description: Join our team as a React frontend developer. You will be responsible for building modern, responsive web applications using React, TypeScript, and modern UI frameworks.
requirements: Knowledge of state management (Redux, Context API)

title: Machine Learning Engineer
description: We're seeking a talented ML engineer to develop and deploy machine learning models. Experience with NLP, computer vision, and deep learning frameworks is essential.
requirements: MSc or PhD in Computer Science or related field
Strong Python and ML framework experience (TensorFlow, PyTorch)

title: Full Stack Developer Internship
description: 6-month internship opportunity for aspiring full-stack developers. Work on real projects using modern web technologies including React, Node.js, and Python.
requirements: Currently pursuing a degree in Computer Science
Basic knowledge of React and Node.js

title: DevOps Engineer
description: Looking for a DevOps engineer to manage our cloud infrastructure and CI/CD pipelines. Experience with Kubernetes, Docker, and AWS is required.
requirements: Expert knowledge of Docker and Kubernetes
Knowledge of monitoring and logging tools

title: Data Scientist
description: Join our data science team to analyze large datasets and build predictive models. Strong statistical knowledge and Python skills are essential.
requirements: MSc in Statistics, Mathematics, or related field
Experience with SQL and data visualization

title: Backend Developer - Node.js
description: We need a skilled Node.js backend developer to build scalable microservices and APIs. Experience with MongoDB and message queues is preferred.

title: UI/UX Designer
description: Creative UI/UX designer needed to design beautiful and intuitive user interfaces. Portfolio showcasing web and mobile design work is required.
requirements: Proficiency in Figma and Adobe Creative Suite
Strong portfolio of web and mobile designs

title: Software Engineering Internship
description: Summer internship program for computer science students. Work on innovative projects with mentorship from senior engineers.
requirements: Enrolled in Computer Science or related program
Knowledge of at least one programming language

title: Cybersecurity Analyst
description: Protect our systems and data as a cybersecurity analyst. Experience with security frameworks, penetration testing, and incident response required.

title: Mobile App Developer - React Native
description: Develop cross-platform mobile applications using React Native. Experience with both iOS and Android deployment is required.
requirements: Experience with iOS and Android deployment

title: AI/ML Research Internship
description: Research internship focused on cutting-edge AI and machine learning. Ideal for PhD students or advanced MSc candidates.
requirements: MSc or PhD student in AI/ML or related field

title: Product Manager - Tech
description: Lead product development for our tech products. Strong technical background combined with business acumen required.

title: Cloud Architect
description: Design and implement cloud architecture solutions for enterprise clients. AWS or Azure certification required.

title: Junior Web Developer
description: Entry-level position for recent graduates. Learn and grow with our experienced team while working on client projects.
requirements: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or related field
Basic knowledge of HTML, CSS, JavaScript
Familiarity with at least one framework (React, Vue, or Angular)
